title: Student Performance Prediction Strategy through Virtual Tutor-Based Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: For graduate students in science, a course practicing personalized instructional interventions via learning analytics tools and virtual tutors in a BYOD environment, with real-time monitoring of learning effects through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Design a student performance prediction model using learning analytics tools and apply path analysis techniques
Propose instructional intervention plans implementing motivation, learning design, and communication strategies via virtual tutor systems
Design a process for providing personalized learning feedback by analyzing formative assessment results based on learning data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
